      • checkForExprChain

        private soot.Value checkForExprChain(soot.Value val)

        Parameters:
        val - value to check
        Returns:
        the new Jimple-local or the value from the parameter

      • processBlock

        private soot.Unit processBlock(com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree node)
        If the node is a block, transforms it into single statements or else returns its head
        Parameters:
        node - node containing the block or a single statement
        Returns:
        either the first statement of the block or the single statement

      • searchMethod

        private soot.SootMethod searchMethod(soot.SootClass klass,
                                     java.lang.String methodname,
                                     java.util.List<soot.Type> givenParas)
        Searches for a matching method, considers all superclasses and interfaces
        Parameters:
        klass - the base class, where either the class itself or its superclass contains the method
        methodname - name of the wanted method
        givenParas - types of the parameter, which can contain superclasses and interfaces
        Returns:
        the found method

      • matchingParameter

        private boolean matchingParameter(java.util.List<soot.Type> foundParameter,
                                  java.util.List<soot.Type> givenParas)
        Checks if two lists of types match
        Parameters:
        foundParameter - the fixed list of types
        givenParas - the list of types that need to match
        Returns:
        true, if the two lists match, else false

      • isAllowedClass

        private boolean isAllowedClass(soot.SootClass foundClass,
                               soot.SootClass givenClass)
        Checks if two classes match each other, e.g. via super class or interface
        Parameters:
        foundClass - the class to look for
        givenClass - the specific class from which every interface, super class and outer class has to be checked
        Returns:
        true, if they match, else false

      • deleteNops

        private void deleteNops(soot.jimple.JimpleBody jb)
        Deletes all nop-statements used as a placeholder for jumps
        Parameters:
        jb - Jimple-body containing the method

      • isPrefix

        private boolean isPrefix(com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree node)
        Checks an unary operation-node and returns true if its a prefix-increment/decrement
        Parameters:
        node - node containing the calculation
        Returns:
        true, if its a prefix-calculation, else false

      • isPostfix

        private boolean isPostfix(com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree node)
        Checks an unary operation-node and returns true if its a postfix-increment/decrement
        Parameters:
        node - node containing the calculation
        Returns:
        true, if its a postfix-calculation, else false

      • ignoreNode

        private com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree ignoreNode(com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree node)
        Checks if the node is a Parens- or ExpressionStatment-node and ignores them because they are irrelevant for the Jimple-code
        Parameters:
        node - node to check
        Returns:
        if true returns the child-node, else the node itself

      • enumValueOf

        private void enumValueOf()
        Adds the valueOf method to the enum class

      • enumInit

        private void enumInit()
        Adds the visible constructor to the enum class

      • enumValues

        private void enumValues()
        Adds the values method to the enum class

      • enumConstructor

        private void enumConstructor()
        Adds the hidden constructor to the enum class
